Stopped in here for lunch on our first day in Barcelona and we were pleasantly surprised! The tapas style buffet was delicious and varied, each item costs only €1.50 and has a wooden cocktail stick in it - simply keep the sticks and you will be charged accordingly! Delicious fritatta slices, warm chorizo and rich cheeses were just some of the choices available. Washed down with a delicious Estrella and it made for a very pleasant lunch!
